tool.help:
=============================== Calculate community metrics from abundance data ===============================
**What it does**
This tool from PAMPA toolsuite computes community metrics from abundance data. - Presence / absence - Specific richness - Shannon index - Simpson index - Pielou index - Hill index - Relative richness
